Judul: Altitude estimation for a celestial navigation system based on infrared Earth measurement

This paper proposes a spacecraft altitude estimationmethod for the CNS based on infrared Earth measurement. An infrared Earth sensor first determines the Earthobservation vector between the spacecraft and the Earth center relative to the inertial frame.
